p: These results suggested that MpEO could exert its antioxidant and/or radical scavenging activities thus preventing the formation of the carbon free radicals originated from CCl 4 metabolism as well as ROS and peroxidation products. This hypothesis is supported by the recent findings on the in vitro antiradical and antioxidative activities of MpEO [ 16]. Previous studies showed that menthol and its derivatives were the major compounds responsible for antioxidant activity of MpEO [ 15].
